Key Match Events: Zack Littell shut down Cleveland for six innings
rookie Logan Driscoll hit his first career homer, a two-run shot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland’s loss coupled with Kansas City’s win reduced the Guardians’ division lead to three games
Others: Rookie Daniel Schneemann took Kwan’s leadoff spot and in left
RHP Ben Lively (bruised thigh) threw a bullpen session and is on track to start Sunday’s series finale
LF Christopher Morel was replaced after hitting a single in the third inning. The team said he had right Achilles tendon discomfort
